prod_short_desc: Intercept the Kryptonite with the armored Batmobile!
prod_long_desc:
Use Batman's Batmobile—featuring big wheels and opening doors—to battle for the Kryptonite. Fire the stud shooters and evade the forklift's flick missiles. Face off against LexCorp henchman's stud-shooting bazooka with Batman's silver Batarang and explode the Kryptonite cargo from the spring-loaded forklift. Includes 3 minifigures: Batman™ and 2 LexCorp henchmen.
Includes 3 minifigures: Batman™ and 2 LexCorp henchmen.
The Batmobile features an opening cockpit for Batman™, big wheels and 2 stud shooters.
Fire the flick missiles of the forklift and activate the spring-loaded explode function.
The back of the forklift can also be detached as the battle hots up.
Weapons include Batman's silver Batarang and the LexCorp henchman's stud-shooting bazooka.
Also includes a comic book!
Batmobile measures over 1” high, 7” long and 3” wide.
Forklift measures over 3” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
